metadata.title: Fauxwood Impressions 36003200 32-Inch by 36-Inch Window Blinds, White
features: Their energy efficient and vinyl construction insulates heat and cold
Offers 20-percent more superior light blocking and uv protection than traditional wood and faux wood blinds
Made with recyclable materials and uses up to 30-percent less material in their production
Conform to all child safety regulations with independent tassel and string designs eliminating loops
Their energy efficient and vinyl construction insulates heat and cold
offers 20-percent more superior light blocking and up protection than traditional wood and faux wood blinds
Made with recyclable materials and uses up to 30-percent less material in their production
Conform to all child safety regulations with independent tassel and string designs eliminating loops
description: Fauxwood Impressions Blinds are a superior alternative to traditional wood and faux wood Blinds. They feature the elegant, luxury appearance of wood blinds at a fraction of the cost and their exclusive under bed design blocks 20-percent more light-providing superior room darkening and improved energy efficiency over more expensive traditional wood and faux wood blinds. They also feature a low maintenance, Anti-Dust and static repellant material. Improve your homes appearance and energy efficiency with Fauxwood Impressions. Blinds conform to all child safety regulations with independent tassel/string designs eliminating loops.
